posts.post_content: Compare to [Rapacious One](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rapacious One) which, despite the difference in rarity, loses out in being harder to cast if you're running two or more colors, doesn't inherently have Trample, and can't make spawn tokens when it hits your opponent. Rarity certainly seems to have a large influence in power of newly printed cards these days, it seems.
